casebody.data:
Horace G. PENDER, as Trustee of Casper Charles Trepel, Bankrupt, Appellant, v. FIRST NATIONAL BANK OF FARMINGDALE, Respondent. No. 391. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 7, 1934. Leon Leighton, of New York City, for appellant. Underhill & Foster, of Brooklyn, N. Y., (James K. Foster, of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (4 F. Supp. 79) affirmed.
